Package cpsc2150.extendedCheckers.models

Class CheckerBoardMem

java.lang.Object
cpsc2150.extendedCheckers.models.CheckerBoardMem
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICheckerBoard
public class CheckerBoardMem extends Object
A class representing a memory-conscious implementation of a checkerboard. Extends AbsCheckerBoard and implements the cpsc2150.extendedCheckers.models.ICheckerBoard interface.

  • Field Summary
